PHRASE.LANG: This striking costume will make you look beheaded! As hilarious as it is gruesome, it will be certain to turn a few heads, and be the center of attention at any Party! [#Legal]
Avec ce costume étonnant, vous aurez l'air décapité! Aussi irrésistible que choquant, ce déguisement ne laissera personne indifférent, et attirera l'attention de tous, où que vous soyez! [#Legal]
Mit diesem markanten Kostüm werden Sie kopflos aussehen! So komisch wie grausam ist, wird es sicher sein, ein paar Köpfe drehen, und wird das Zentrum der Aufmerksamkeit zu jeder Party![#Legal]
Con questo incredibile costume, si guarderà senza testa! Irresistibile come scioccante, questo costume non lascia nessuno indifferente, e di attirare l'attenzione di tutti, ovunque tu sia![#Legal]
Con este traje increíble, tu se verá sin cabeza! Como irresistible como impactante, este traje no deja indiferente a nadie, y atraer la atención de todo el mundo, dondequiera que estés! [#Legal]
This striking costume will make you look beheaded! As hilarious as it is gruesome, it will be certain to turn a few heads, and be the center of attention at any Party! [#Legal]
This striking costume will make you look beheaded! As hilarious as it is gruesome, it will be certain to turn a few heads, and be the center of attention at any Party! [#Legal]
